values: 领带；绑带；绳索；线缆；关联；纽带；束缚；平局；不分胜负；横梁；支撑杆；[音]连音线；延音线
系紧；捆绑；绑定；拴住；扎紧；束紧；束缚；将…系在…上；连接；结合；打结；系扣；打领带；（比赛或竞赛中）得相同分数；与…建立联系；使有义务；使受限制；用连接线连接（音符）

synonym.mean: 打结；不分胜负；被用带系住
领带；平局；鞋带；领结；不分胜负

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 系（tie的过去式和过去分词）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 专指用链条或金属环将某人或某物锁住或系住。
普通用词，指用绳索等将东西扎紧捆牢。
指将某物紧紧地固定起来，使之完全无损。
多指把两个或两个以上的人或物牢牢地系或扎在一起。
指把某物牢牢地拴在、钉在或锁在另一物上，使不能任意移动。

word_group.brief_definition: 使被困于...；使被...束缚；依靠
社区关系；社会关系；社会联系
蝶形领结；百衲被上的蝶形领结图案
连接线；电话直接连接线
白领结；配白领结的男士夜礼服
校友领带；公学校友情谊

bilingual.source: That man is wearing a suit and tie.
bilingual.target: 那个男人穿着西装和领带。

bilingual.source: Everyone is wearing a jacket and tie!
bilingual.target: 每个人都穿着夹克和领带！

bilingual.source: It looks perfect with his grey tie.
bilingual.target: 它和他的灰色领带看起来很完美。

bilingual.source: No, you're expected to wear a suit and tie.
bilingual.target: 不，你应该穿西装打领带。

bilingual.source: Look, everyone is wearing a jacket and tie!
bilingual.target: 看，每个人都穿着夹克和领带！

bilingual.source: All students are required to dress formally on this occasion, so each boy must wear a suit and tie.
bilingual.target: 所有学生在这种场合都需要穿正式服装，所以每个男孩都必须穿西装和领带。

bilingual.source: He enjoyed himself making the assistant bring almost everything in the shop to him before he finally settled on buying a tie.
bilingual.target: 他乐于让店员把店里的几乎所有东西都拿给他看，最后才决定买一条领带。

bilingual.source: I don't know how to tie a tie.
It took him a few minutes to tie his tie.
bilingual.target: 他花了几分钟才把领带打结。

list.abstract: tie，英文单词，用作动词、名词，翻译为用线绳等系、联合、约束、与……成平局、鞋带、纽带、束缚、淘汰赛、延音线等。

yingyinNormal.en: Nina! Mr. Douglas. Cool tie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 妮娜。道格拉斯先生，领带不错。

yingyinNormal.en: That's an interesting tie clip. Oh, thanks. It's, Avogadro's constant.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个领带夹还挺有趣的。谢谢，这是阿伏伽德罗常量。

yingyinNormal.en: Has he ever dressed like this? No. No. Jacket and tie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他有穿戴成这样吗? 不，没有，都是西装领带。

yingyinNormal.en: There could be a mathematical explanation for how bad your tie is.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那一定有一个数学上的解释来证明你的领带有多差。

yingyinNormal.en: Gee, Sheldon, you're asking the wrong girl. I'm usually on the other side of the tie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿，你问错人了，我通常在领带的另一边。

yingyinNormal.en: I tell you, it starts with a briefcase, then you put on a tie, you sit at a desk.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我告诉你，先是拎个公文包，接着再系上领带，坐上办公桌。

yingyinNormal.en: I know it says black tie optional, but this may be pushing it a little.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道单子上写 “打领带与否，自行决定”，但这样会不会太过分了点？

yingyinNormal.en: Was he wearing a stunning blue suit? And a power tie? No, pretty much just a towel. Oh, God!
yingyinNormal.zh: 他穿着迷人的蓝色西装？打着领带？不，他只围一条浴巾。上帝呀。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello, Sheldon. I'm not allowed to wear my Silver Surfer neck tie, but you can wear a bathrobe?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你来啦，谢尔顿。我想打银影侠的领带都不行，你却可以穿浴袍啊？

yingyinNormal.en: Is this your only tie? Technically, yes. But if you'll notice. It's reversible. So it works as two.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是你唯一的领带吗？理论上，是的，但如果你仔细看会发现这是两面的，所以可以当两条用。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, look, a tie on the doorknob usually means someone doesn't want to be disturbed because, they're, you know, getting busy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，是这样，门把手上挂条领带，意思是里面的人不想被打扰，因为他们在忙活。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, no, no. I'm an intern, just like you guys. Except for the tie, the briefcase and the fact that I can rent a car.
yingyinNormal.zh: 喔，不，我是实习生，就跟你们一样。除了这领带，公事包，还有我已到达合法年龄可以租车以外。

yingyinNormal.en: No one's ever liked the tie clip before, so I just lost all control.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从来没人喜欢过这个领带夹，所以我就失控了。

yingyinNormal.en: How's my tie? How's my tie?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的领结如何？我的又如何？

yingyinNormal.en: Is that why you wanted to tie my tie?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那就是你要帮我打领结的原因？

yingyinNormal.en: I didn't work my whole life for a tie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我这辈子这么努力可不是为了平局。

yingyinNormal.en: Bruce Wayne doesn't make his roommate tie it for him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 布鲁斯·韦恩也不会让他的室友帮忙系啊。

yingyinNormal.en: All right. Let's just call this, tie score and it's halftime.
yingyinNormal.zh: 比赛算平手，现在是中场休息。

yingyinNormal.en: Bring in your oars over there. Tie these two boats together as well.
yingyinNormal.zh: 桨收进来，船绑在一起。

yingyinNormal.en: This is a rescue. I'm helping you escape. Can you fly a TIE fighter?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是一项援救行动，我是来帮你逃出去的，你会驾驶TIE战斗机吗？

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 使被困于...；使被...束缚；依靠
社区关系；社会关系；社会联系

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 系紧的；包扎着的；拴着的；打成平局的；得相同比分的；取得同等成就的；束缚；约束；限制

word_family.mean: v. 系；缚；拴；捆；扎；连接；联合；使有关联；打成平局；势均力敌；得相等比分

examination_example.sentence: For public institutions, state funds are sometimes <highlight>tied</highlight> partly to their success on metrics such as graduation rates and student retention.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对公共机构来说，国家基金有时会与它们在毕业率和学生留校率等指标上的成功有一定关系。

examination_example.sentence: The Wall Street Journal finds that "a substantial part" of executive pay is now <highlight>tied</highlight> to performance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 华尔街日报发现，高管薪酬的“很大一部分”现在与业绩挂钩。

examination_example.sentence: Our legal system was designed to set law apart from politics precisely because they are so closely <highlight>tied</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的法律体系旨在将法律与政治区分开来，因为它们是如此紧密地联系在一起。

sense_info_list.en: fasten or secure with a rope, string, or cord

examination_example.sentence: Parts of the ceremony involve ritual hair cutting, <highlight>tying</highlight> cotton threads soaked in holy water around the bride's and groom's wrists.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 婚礼仪式包含剪发仪式、把圣水浸泡过的棉线系在新郎和新娘的手腕上。

sense_info_list.en: a thing that restricts one's freedom of action
achieve the same score or ranking as another competitor or team
unite musical notes by a tie

word_usage.usage: tie A to B，表示“将A连接到B”；
tie作名词时，意为“纽带，联系”，是可数名词。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 系; 绑; 带子; 领带

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a thing that unites or links people; a social or business relationship

examination_example.sentence: It also helps to opt for clothes you perceive as <highlight>tying</highlight> in with your goals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 选择你认为与你的目标相关的衣服也会有所帮助。

examination_example.sentence: If they abandon their beliefs, they run the risk of losing social <highlight>ties</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果他们放弃信仰，他们就有失去社会联系的风险。

examination_example.sentence: Collegial (同事的) <highlight>ties</highlight> can help overcome a range of workplace issues affecting productivity and the quality of work output.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 同事关系可以帮助解决一系列职场问题的。这些问题往往会影响工作效率和工作质量。

sense_info_list.en: fasten or secure with a rope, string, or cord
sense_info_list.zh: 系; 绑; 带子; 领带

examination_example.sentence: If your goal is to improve your thinking, avoid bows, <highlight>ties</highlight> and unnecessary accessories.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你的目标是提高你的思维能力，那么就不要戴蝴蝶结、领带和不必要的配饰。

sense_info_list.en: a thing that restricts one's freedom of action
achieve the same score or ranking as another competitor or team

exam_freq_info.chinese: 系; 绑; 带子; 领带

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 使被困于...；使被...束缚；依靠

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a thing that unites or links people; a social or business relationship

examination_example.sentence: Researchers think that one explanation is that <highlight>ties</highlight> to friends are broken while academic demands are rising.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员认为，一种解释是，当学术需求上升时，与朋友的联系被打破了。

examination_example.sentence: But the vast majority of American parents who pay allowance <highlight>tie</highlight> it to the completion of housework.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是绝大多数给零花钱的美国父母都把零花钱和完成家务联系在一起。

examination_example.sentence: To help to strengthen family <highlight>ties</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 帮助增强家庭关系。

sense_info_list.en: a thing that restricts one's freedom of action

examination_example.sentence: Beyond gender, young adult's living arrangements differ considerable by education — which is <highlight>tied</highlight> to financial means.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除了性别之外，年轻人的生活安排也因受教育程度的不同而存在很大差异，而教育程度又与经济状况密切相关。

sense_info_list.en: fasten or secure with a rope; string; or cord
sense_info_list.zh: 系; 绑; 带子; 领带

sense_info_list.en: achieve the same score or ranking as another competitor or team

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: By sharing their arts experiences, community members can develop a stronger <highlight>tie</highlight> between them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过分享他们的艺术经历，社区成员可以在他们之间建立更紧密的联系。

examination_example.sentence: Recent research suggests that if an argument gets resolved, the emotional response <highlight>tied</highlight> to it is significantly reduced or almost completely erased.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近的研究表明，如果一场争论得到解决，与之相关的情绪反应会显著降低或几乎完全消失。

examination_example.sentence: Von Wong and a group of volunteers collected more than 10,000 pieces of plastic, which were then <highlight>tied</highlight> together.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Von Wong和一群志愿者收集了一万多块塑料，然后将它们绑在一起。

examination_example.sentence: While the validity of the idea is still being assessed, the lowered stress can even be <highlight>tied</highlight> back to blood pressure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然这一想法的有效性仍在评估中，但降低的压力甚至可能与血压有关。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 系; 绑; 带子; 领带

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 系紧的；包扎着的；拴着的；打成平局的；得相同比分的；取得同等成就的；束缚；约束；限制

word_family.mean: v. 系；缚；拴；捆；扎；连接；联合；使有关联；打成平局；势均力敌；得相等比分

sense_info_list.en: fasten or secure with a rope, string, or cord
sense_info_list.zh: 系; 绑; 带子; 领带

examination_example.sentence: We need something to <highlight>tie</highlight> his leg with.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们需要一些东西来绑住他的腿。

examination_example.sentence: First, don't <highlight>tie</highlight> your shoes too closely.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首先，不要把鞋带系得太紧。

examination_example.sentence: The big man, smartly dressed in a suit and <highlight>tie</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那个身材高大的男人，西装革履，穿着得体。

sense_info_list.en: a thing that unites or links people; a social or business relationship

examination_example.sentence: It is then clear that biological development and cultural development are closely <highlight>tied</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那么很明显，生物发展和文化发展是紧密相连的。

examination_example.sentence: Keeping family recipes is saving and honoring our tradition so that future generations can continue to make family <highlight>ties</highlight> stronger.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 保留家庭食谱就是保存和尊重我们的传统，以便子孙后代可以继续加强家庭纽带。

examination_example.sentence: Humans are believed to be <highlight>tied</highlight> to nature.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们认为人类与自然息息相关。
